function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19 in vulnerable communities within protected and conserved areas","Impact":"Severe health impacts on local households and communities, potential loss of biodiversity due to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing effective public health measures, vaccination programs, and community education on disease prevention","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing technology, and remote healthcare services","People":"Local households, communities within protected and conserved areas","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare organizations, and conservation management authorities"}]}
